thread.title: Kendall Jenner Exercise Secrets- Kendall Jenner Ab Workout
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner Exercise Secrets- Kendall Jenner Ab Workout

author: Jenna Rosenstein
title: Kendall Jenner Exercise Secrets- Kendall Jenner Ab Workout
text:
We all know models are genetically blessedâ€”but you'd be a fool to think they don't sweat hard in the gym to tone and perfect their muscles. Kendall Jenner is no exception. On the model's eponymous app today, she spilled a few secrets for strengthening her abs. "My abs are my favorite thing to work out. I love it when my trainer, Gunnar Peterson , kills my abs," she writes. "The next day, it hurts to even laugh. That's how I know I'm doing the exercises right!"
there's no crying in baseball
A post shared by Kendall (@kendalljenner) on Feb 1, 2017 at 8:17am PST
